title: We Must Preserve the Truth | Guests: Ian Smith & Rob Smith | 7/28/20
description:
It’s more important than ever to preserve artifacts of American history that tell stories we can’t forget. Remember that time when Joe Biden eulogized former KKK member Robert Byrd? Atilis Gym co-owner Ian Smith gives the latest updates in his battle against government tyranny after he was arrested for refusing to close down. The Democrats’ insane grilling of Attorney General Barr is a new low. A group of big teachers’ unions demands a moratorium on all public schools. Glenn presents today’s Woke Party Citizen Brief. “Always a Soldier” author Rob Smith explains why coming out as conservative was harder than coming out as gay. Attorney Keith Sullivan discusses a discrimination lawsuit filed by an iconic 9/11 fireman.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
